LanguageData.RimTalk_ChildrenOuting.label: children's outing
LanguageData.RimTalk_ChildrenOuting.letterText: The children are going on an outing! They will explore the area and play together, gaining recreation and social satisfaction.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ChildrenOuting.calledOffMessage: The children's outing has been called off.
